title: Cheltenham College
subtitle: Every year College hosts a group of cricketers from The Refugee Cricket Project which is a charitable offshoot of the @refugeecouncil. title: Giles Duley
subtitle:
Deeply moving to see this photograph at @TheGalleryDMU
I made the image in 2015 of a baby moments after being born in Zaatari refugee camp. In those first seconds this Syrian baby was the youngest refugee; now he’s 4 & still living in the camp. What future lies in store for him? pic.twitter.com/Jj42HxBUzj
